1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Relmap operators concerning nested relation.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Nest.Flow
6  ( -- * down
7    consDown, relmapDown, relkitDown,
8    -- * up
9    consUp, relmapUp, relkitUp,
10    -- * chunk
11    consChunk, relmapChunk, relkitChunk,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus          as K
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base          as Rop
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
18
19
20-- ----------------------  down
21
22-- | __down \/N__
23--
24--   Enclose input relation at term @\/N@.
25--   In other words, relation flows down to nested level.
26--
27consDown :: (K.CRel c) => C.RopCons c
28consDown med =
29  do n <- Rop.getTerm med "-term"
30     Right $ relmapDown med n
31
32-- | Create @down@ relmap.
33relmapDown :: (K.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> K.TermName -> C.Relmap c
34relmapDown med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitDown
35
36-- | Create @down@ relkit.
37relkitDown :: (K.CRel c) => K.TermName -> C.RelkitFlow c
38relkitDown _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
39relkitDown n (Just he1) = Right kit where
40    he2       = K.headConsNest n he1 mempty
41    kit       = C.relkitWhole False he2 flow
42    flow bo1  = [[ K.pRel $ K.Rel he1 bo1 ]]
43
44
45-- ----------------------  up
46
47-- | __up \/P__
48--
49--   Lift nested relation @\/P@ up to current flow.
50--
51consUp :: (K.CRel c) => C.RopCons c
52consUp med =
53  do n <- Rop.getTerm med "-term"
54     Right $ relmapUp med n
55
56-- | Create @up@ relmap.
57relmapUp :: (K.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> K.TermName -> C.Relmap c
58relmapUp med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitUp
59
60-- | Create @up@ relkit.
61relkitUp :: (K.CRel c) => K.TermName -> C.RelkitFlow c
62relkitUp _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
63relkitUp n (Just he1)
64    | K.newTermsExist pk  = Msg.newTerm pk he1
65    | K.isSingleton t1    = Right kit2
66    | otherwise           = Msg.notNestRel [n] he1
67    where
68      pk     = K.termPicker [n] he1
69      pick   = K.pickTerms pk
70      he1'   = K.headMap pick he1
71      t1     = K.headNested he1'
72      he2    = K.headUp he1'
73      kit2   = C.relkitMany True he2 flow
74      flow   = K.relBody . K.gRel . head . pick
75
76
77-- ----------------------  chunk
78
79-- | __chunk \/N ... -order \/P ...__
80--
81--   Split input relation into multiple chunks named \/N ....
82--   The input relation is ordered by \/P ....
83--
84consChunk :: (Ord c, K.CRel c) => C.RopCons c
85consChunk med =
86  do ns  <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
87     ord <- Rop.getOpt [] Rop.getTerms med "-order"
88     Right $ relmapChunk med ns ord
89
90-- | Create @chunk@ relmap.
91relmapChunk :: (Ord c, K.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> [K.TermName] -> [K.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
92relmapChunk med ns ord = C.relmapFlow med $ relkitChunk ns ord
93
94-- | Create @chunk@ relkit.
95relkitChunk :: (Ord c, K.CRel c) => [K.TermName] -> [K.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
96relkitChunk _ _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
97relkitChunk ns ord (Just he1) = Right kit where
98    he2       = K.headNests ns he1
99    kit       = C.relkitWhole False he2 flow
100    flow bo1  = let deg    = length bo1 `ceilingRem` length ns
101                    bo1'   = K.sortByName (map K.Asc ord) ns bo1
102                    ch     = K.chunks deg bo1'
103                    rels   = (K.pRel . K.Rel he1) `map` ch
104                in [rels]
105
106ceilingRem :: (Integral a) => a -> a -> a
107ceilingRem a b =
108    case a `quotRem` b of
109      (q, 0) -> q
110      (q, _) -> q + 1
111
